Title: Ladyhawke
Writer: Edward Khmara (screenplay), Michael Thomas (screenplay), Tom Mankiewicz (screenplay), Edward Khmara (story)
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Rutger Hauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Leo McKern
Plot: Philipe Gastone, a thief, escapes from the dungeon at Aquila, sparking a manhunt. He is nearly captured when Captain Navarre befriends him. Navarre has been hunted by the Bishop's men for two years, ever since he escaped with the Lady Isabeau who the Bishop has lusted after. Navarre and Isabeau have a curse that the Bishop has placed on them that causes Navarre to be a wolf during the night and Isabeau to be a hawk during the day. Navarre insists that Philipe help him re-enter the city to help him kill the heavily guarded Bishop.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 5 nominations.
